welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Radcliff, a charming and welcoming city known for its small-town charm and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and make unforgettable memories while enjoying our local cuisine, outdoor adventures, and rich history."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Godman AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Godman AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Louisville International Airport houses all ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Louisville International Airport serves as a hub for cargo and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
